keyword: how many calories in a cinnabon
title: How Many Calories in a Cinnabon?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cinnabon, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and tips for variations under 160 characters.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cinnabon?
assumptions: Standard Classic Cinnabon cinnamon roll with cream cheese frosting; approximately 148 g serving size, fresh-baked.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, recipe changes, and customizations; values based on official Cinnabon data. Check with the brand for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A classic Cinnabon roll contains about 880 calories and 13 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a classic Cinnabon?
What are the carbs in a Cinnabon?
faqs.a: About 119 g total carbs, including 67 g sugars and 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Cinnabon high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 36 g total fat per roll, with 18 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Cinnabon?
faqs.a: Roughly 13 g protein per standard roll.
Yes, minis have about 440 kcal; skip frosting to reduce by 200 kcal.
